top_stories.title: Uzbekistan GDP hits record €123 billion as Mirziyoyev hails reforms
top_stories.summary: President Mirziyoyev announced record GDP of €123.25 billion, 23% export growth, €37 billion foreign investment, and gold reserves over €51 billion.
top_stories.opportunity: Lower borrowing costs due to credit rating upgrade, support for SMEs and women entrepreneurs

top_stories.title: Uzbekistan 2026 Outlook: Sustained growth and reforms
top_stories.summary: GDP growth 6.8–7.6% in 2025, inflation at 7.5%, exports up 28% to $29bn, WTO accession in spring 2026, IT sector boom with unicorn Uzum.
top_stories.opportunity: Investment in fintech, AI, e-commerce, regional hub for finance and technology

top_stories.title: IMF praises Uzbekistan's strong economy, projects 6% GDP growth in 2026
top_stories.summary: Real GDP up 7.6% in 2025 Q1-Q3, inflation easing to 7.8%, outlook positive with WTO accession targeted for March 2026.
top_stories.opportunity: Structural reforms in SOEs, anti-corruption to boost private sector and productivity

top_stories.title: Uzbekistan GDP to reach $167 billion in 2026 with 782 new projects
top_stories.summary: 2025 GDP over $145bn, 2026 plans include $52bn in industrial projects, AI labs, data centers in healthcare, transport, agriculture.
top_stories.opportunity: Digitalization, AI innovation, attracting international investors via guarantees

top_stories.title: Uzbekistan hosts 336 U.S. companies
top_stories.summary: As of Dec 1, 2025, 336 U.S.-capital enterprises, mostly in Tashkent; new Uzbekistan-U.S. Business Council launched.
top_stories.opportunity: Deepened trade and investment ties with U.S.

top_stories.title: Uzbek citizens allowed unrestricted investment in U.S. market from Jan 1, 2026
top_stories.summary: Presidential decree enables investments via personal accounts, establishes U.S.-Uzbekistan Business Council.
top_stories.opportunity: Direct access for citizens to U.S. markets and financing

top_stories.title: 474,900 active enterprises in Uzbekistan as of Jan 1, 2026
top_stories.summary: 85% are small businesses, reflecting business growth.
top_stories.opportunity: Expansion of private sector and entrepreneurship

top_stories.title: 1,199 enterprises with Kazakh investment in Uzbekistan
top_stories.summary: Foreign trade turnover $72.8bn in Jan-Nov 2025, up 21.8%; trade with Kazakhstan increased.

top_stories.title: Plans for first satellite launch and astronaut preparation
top_stories.summary: President announces satellite launch, astronaut program, tech hubs as part of reforms.
top_stories.opportunity: Space tech development and research investment

top_stories.title: IT sector growth with AI centers, satellite development
top_stories.summary: Fintech, AI, e-commerce expansion; Uzum unicorn status; open banking frameworks.
top_stories.opportunity: International partnerships in AI and digital banking

business_news.title: Uzbekistan hosts 336 U.S. companies
business_news.summary: 336 U.S.-capital enterprises as of Dec 2025, new Business Council.

business_news.title: Unrestricted U.S. investments for citizens from Jan 2026
business_news.summary: Presidential decree lifts restrictions, creates investment council.

tech_news.title: First satellite and astronaut program announced
tech_news.summary: Investment in space tech, research centers.

tech_news.title: AI labs, data centers, supercomputers in 2026
tech_news.summary: 782 projects include digitalization in key sectors.

tech_news.title: IT boom: Fintech, AI, Uzum unicorn

summary: Uzbekistan's economy shows robust momentum with record GDP, strong investment inflows from U.S. and Kazakhstan, IT/space tech advances, and reforms paving way for WTO entry and 6-7% growth in 2026.
